<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List Api Keys"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1/api-keys/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



List API keys for an organization.
Shows all non-deleted keys (both active and inactive).
Users can see and manage the active/inactive status of their keys.

Args:
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    List of API keys (excludes soft-deleted keys)

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful Response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"api_keys":{"items":{"properties":{"name":{"type":"string","maxLength":255,"minLength":1,"title":"Name","description":"User-friendly name for the API key"},"scopes":{"items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array","minItems":1,"title":"Scopes","description":"List of permissions/scopes"},"expires_at":{"anyOf":[{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},{"type":"null"}],"title":"Expires At","description":"Optional expiration date"},"extra_metadata":{"anyOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"null"}],"title":"Extra Metadata","description":"Additional JSON metadata"},"id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","title":"Id"},"organization_id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","title":"Organization Id"},"key_id":{"type":"string","title":"Key Id","description":"Public key identifier (safe to display)"},"created_by":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","title":"Created By"},"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","title":"Created At"},"last_used_at":{"anyOf":[{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},{"type":"null"}],"title":"Last Used At"},"is_active":{"type":"boolean","title":"Is Active"},"is_deleted":{"type":"boolean","title":"Is Deleted","description":"Whether the key is soft-deleted","default":false}},"type":"object","required":["name","scopes","id","organization_id","key_id","created_by","created_at","last_used_at","is_active"],"title":"APIKeyRead","description":"Schema for reading API key (without sensitive data)."},"type":"array","title":"Api Keys"},"total":{"type":"integer","title":"Total"}},"type":"object","required":["api_keys","total"],"title":"APIKeyListResponse","description":"Schema for API key list response."}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
